The only reason I am commenting is because I finally figured out why Dr. Cox was bald. Although we probably all realized it at the same time this week Dr. Cox is bald because he has Raynaud's disease. If you look carefully every time he is disgusted, his hands swell, which is a symptom of Raynaud's. And if you look at him when it is cold, many of his fingers are a whiteish-blue because the disease limits circulation to
